page.title: 14Pastimes in Hemsworth 4
page.content: {Home Computers} At home we have an Amstrad computer with a built in cassette player and a green screen monitor. We also have twelve games, three of which are educational. Our computer has a large memory and is different from the BBC computer. I'd like to know more about computers because it might be useful in the future for studying. Nowadays there are computers everywhere; in schools, homes and places of work. I shouldn't like them everywhere because people may be put out of work.
